content: My desktop computer's specs are: Intel Core i5, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD, and Windows 10. I don't use resource-intensive programs like video editing software or games, but I do use virtual machines for work. I haven't noticed any other symptoms like slow performance or crashes, just the occasional freezing. By the way, I did clean my desktop computer's fans last Sunday, so I'm pretty sure it's not an overheating issue.
